item.title: Running llama on a Raspberry Pi
item.description: Running llama on a Raspberry Pi Inroduction LLM’s are genrally a very compute intensive task and do require a lot of high end hardware to run hence making it virtually impossible to run on regular hardware and most of the LLM’s are closed source. But there are a few LLM’s that are free to download and simplified so that they do not need a huge amount of computational power to run.
